title: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo (The File of Young Kindaichi)
synopsis: Hajime Kindaichi's unorganized appearance and lax nature may give the impression of an average high school student, but a book should never be judged by its cover. Hajime is the grandson of the man who was once Japan's greatest detective, and he is also a remarkable sleuth himself.
